HEADLINE: Billionaire Warren Buffett‚Äôs Berkshire Hathaway Dumped Bank of America, Citi and Capital One, Pivots to These Two Stocks That Are Up Big Year-to-Date
SUMMARY: Two stocks purchased by investment legend Warren Buffett‚Äôs firm in the first quarter of the year have witnessed significant gains in 2025. Filings with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) earlier this year indicate Buffett‚Äôs Berkshire Hathaway bought 238,613 new shares of Domino‚Äôs Pizza (DPZ) in Q1, worth approximately $204 million. The Omaha-based holding company also bought 112,401 new shares of Heico Corporation (HEI), an aerospace and electronics firm. Those new shares were worth nearly $50 million in Q1. Domino‚Äôs stock is up more than 2.5% in the past five days, more than 4% in the past month and more than 13.5% year-to-date. Heico‚Äôs stock is up more than 35% in 2025. Berkshire Hathaway added shares in both firms while hawking $3.23 billion worth of stock in the financial giants Citigroup, Bank of America and Capital One in Q1. Buffett‚Äôs firm completely exited Citigroup in the first quarter, unloading its remaining 14,639,502 shares worth about $1 billion. Berkshire sold an additional 48.7 million Bank of America shares in Q1, worth about $2.19 billion, and 300,000 shares in Capital One exposure, worth more than $46 million. Buffett‚Äôs firm also sold all of its remaining 40,180,168 shares of the Brazilian fintech Nu Holdings, which were worth more than $416 million. Beyond banking, Berkshire also reduced positions in Charter Communications, DaVita, T-Mobile and Liberty Media‚Äôs Formula One stock. HEADLINE: Crypto Price Analysis 7-24: BITCOIN: BTC, ETHEREUM: ETH, SOLANA: SOL, CELESTIA: TIA, OPTIMISM: OP, COSMOS: ATOM
SUMMARY: The crypto market registered a substantial decline over the past 24 hours, dropping nearly 3% as Bitcoin (BTC) , Ethereum (ETH) , and other cryptocurrencies traded in the red. BTC briefly crossed $119,000 earlier in the session, reaching an intraday high of $119,274. However, it lost momentum after reaching this level and dropped to a low of $117,642 before moving to $117,650. The flagship cryptocurrency is down nearly 1% over the past 24 hours. Meanwhile, ETH has registered a substantially larger decline, with the price down almost 4%. The world‚Äôs second-largest cryptocurrency slipped below $3,600 and is currently trading around $3,564. Ripple (XRP) has plunged nearly 12% in the past 24 hours, as sellers look to drive it below $3. Solana (SOL) is down over 8%, trading at around $183, while Dogecoin (DOGE) is down over 11%. Cardano (ADA) , Stellar (XLM) , Chainlink (LINK) , Hedera (HBAR) , Litecoin (LTC) , Toncoin (TON) , and Polkadot (DOT) also registered notable declines. US Looking To Seize $7.1 Million In Crypto The US is planning to auction off $7 million worth of cryptocurrency seized by Homeland Security. The seized crypto is tied to an allegedly fraudulent oil and gas investment scheme. The Seattle US Attorney‚Äôs Office announced on Tuesday that it was filing a civil action to seek the forfeiture of part of the $97 million taken by the scheme between June 2022 and July 2024. Acting US Attorney for Seattle, Teal Luthy Miller, stated, ‚ÄúThe co-schemers in this fraud moved their ill-gotten gain through various cryptocurrency accounts to try to launder the money stolen from victims.‚Äù According to the attorney‚Äôs office, it is seeking the forfeiture of assets belonging to individuals residing in Russia and Nigeria, who used the funds to buy crypto and send it to exchanges in their home countries. US authorities have indicted at least one individual who allegedly facilitated money laundering for transnational criminal organizations. Geoffrey Auyeung was indicted in 2024 after being charged with receiving funds from fraudulent investment schemes. He was also accused of using the stolen funds to buy BTC, USDT, USDC, and ETH, and sending a majority of the assets to Binance. White House Crypto Report Set For July 30 Launch The White House crypto policy report will be released on July 30. The report could potentially ignite an era of US dominance in crypto or increase its regulatory challenges. Bo Hines, executive director of the President‚Äôs Digital Asset Advisory Council, announced that the long-awaited report will be made public on July 30. The document is the result of an extensive, 180-day review by the President‚Äôs Working Group on Digital Assets. The Working Group on Digital Assets is a cross-agency effort involving the Treasury, the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), the Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC), and the Department of Commerce. The report will outline strategies to maintain US leadership in digital finance, including a potential Bitcoin reserve and access to the Fed‚Äôs payment system for blockchain firms. JPMorgan Calls Stablecoin Forecast Optimistic JPMorgan has called the $2 trillion projection for the stablecoin market, often cited during the recent push to approve crypto market regulation, a ‚Äúlittle bit optimistic.‚Äù Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent stated during a Senate hearing that the stablecoin market could potentially exceed the $2 trillion projection by 2028 if there is adequate legislative support. JPMorgan strategists said in a client note, ‚ÄúWe find it hard to believe that the market could grow substantially larger over the next few years, as the infrastructure/ecosystem that supports stablecoins is far from developed and will take time to build out. While adoption is poised to grow further, it might be at a slower pace than what some might anticipate.‚Äù Block Joins S&P 500 Jack Dorsey‚Äôs Block joined the S&P 500 index on Wednesday. Block is the third public company with Bitcoin (BTC) holdings to join the global benchmark. The company currently holds $8,584 BTC, worth around $1 billion at current prices. Block shares on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) have risen 14% since it announced it would join the S&P 500. The S&P 500 tracks the largest publicly-listed US companies, including Tesla and Coinbase. Goldman Sachs, BNY To Offer Tokenized Money Market Funds Goldman Sachs and BNY are planning to offer institutional investors access to tokenized money market funds. This could enable institutional investors to unlock real-time settlement, 24/7 market access, and greater efficiencies across capital markets. BNY clients will also be able to invest in money market funds whose ownership is recorded on Goldman Sachs‚Äô private blockchain. Laide Majiyagbe, the global head of liquidity, financing, and collateral at BNY, stated, ‚ÄúAs the financial system transitions toward a more digital, real-time architecture, BNY is committed to enabling scalable and secure solutions

HEADLINE: CryptoPunk Acquisition: GameSquare‚Äôs Landmark $5.15M Entry into NFTs
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld CryptoPunk Acquisition: GameSquare‚Äôs Landmark $5.15M Entry into NFTs The digital asset landscape continues to evolve at a breathtaking pace, with non-fungible tokens (NFTs) at the forefront of this revolution. Once considered niche collectibles, NFTs are increasingly attracting mainstream attention and significant institutional investment. In a move that underscores this growing trend, Nasdaq-listed GameSquare has made headlines with a landmark CryptoPunk acquisition , signaling a bold new chapter for both the company and the broader Web3 ecosystem. This high-profile transaction isn‚Äôt just about owning a piece of digital art; it‚Äôs a strategic maneuver that speaks volumes about the future of brand identity, community engagement, and corporate presence in the metaverse. Unpacking the Landmark CryptoPunk Acquisition: The Details GameSquare, a prominent player in the esports, gaming, and entertainment sectors, recently announced its acquisition of CryptoPunk #5577. This particular CryptoPunk, a highly sought-after digital collectible, was purchased from none other than Robert Leshner, the visionary founder of Compound, a leading decentralized finance (DeFi) protocol. The reported value of this significant CryptoPunk acquisition stands at an impressive $5.15 million. What makes this deal particularly interesting is the payment structure. Instead of a cash transaction, GameSquare exchanged $5.15 million worth of convertible preferred stock for the NFT. This stock is convertible into approximately 3.4 million common shares of GameSquare at a conversion price of $1.50 per share, according to Chainwire. To understand the nuances of this transaction, let‚Äôs break down what convertible preferred stock entails: Convertible Preferred Stock: This is a type of preferred stock that gives the holder the option to convert it into a fixed number of common shares of the issuing company. It combines features of both debt (fixed dividends) and equity (conversion into common shares). Preferred Status: Preferred stock typically has a higher claim on company assets and earnings than common stock, meaning preferred dividends are paid before common dividends, and preferred shareholders are paid before common shareholders in case of liquidation. Conversion Option: Robert Leshner now holds stock that can be converted into GameSquare common shares, potentially allowing him to participate in the company‚Äôs future growth as a common shareholder. This mechanism offers flexibility and aligns interests, as the value of the convertible stock is tied to GameSquare‚Äôs performance. CryptoPunk #5577 itself is a rare ‚ÄúAlien‚Äù punk, one of only nine such types, making it exceptionally valuable within the CryptoPunks collection. Its distinct features and scarcity contribute significantly to its high market valuation, making it a prized asset for any collector or corporation looking to make a statement in the NFT space. This particular CryptoPunk acquisition is a testament to the enduring value and cultural significance of these early digital artifacts. GameSquare‚Äôs Strategic Leap: Why a CryptoPunk Acquisition? For many, the question arises: why would a Nasdaq-listed company like GameSquare invest millions in a single NFT? The answer lies in GameSquare‚Äôs forward-thinking strategy to integrate Web3 technologies into its core business of esports, gaming, and entertainment. This isn‚Äôt merely an art purchase; it‚Äôs a calculated move to solidify its presence in the burgeoning digital economy. GameSquare operates at the intersection of traditional media and the digital frontier, owning and operating popular esports organizations like Complexity Gaming and creating content for a vast audience. Their decision to pursue a high-profile CryptoPunk acquisition can be seen through several strategic lenses: Brand Identity and Recognition: Owning a CryptoPunk, especially a rare one like #5577, instantly elevates GameSquare‚Äôs profile within the Web3 community. It signals a serious commitment to the space and positions the company as an innovator rather than a bystander. This digital asset can serve as a potent symbol for their brand in virtual environments and marketing campaigns. Community Engagement: NFTs are inherently linked to communities. By acquiring a CryptoPunk, GameSquare taps into the passionate and influential CryptoPunks community, and by extension, the broader NFT and Web3 communities. This opens new avenues for engagement, collaboration, and talent acquisition. Metaverse and Digital Presence: As the metaverse continues to develop, digital identities and assets will play a crucial role. GameSquare, deeply embedded in gaming, understands the importance of virtual presence. A CryptoPunk can serve as a foundational digital identity for the company or its key figures within virtual worlds, enhancing their authenticity and reach. Thought Leadership: This acquisition positions GameSquare as a leader in exploring the practical applications of NFTs for

HEADLINE: Cramer Warns on $37T U.S. Debt‚ÄîBitcoin Hyper Emerges as a Smart Alternative
SUMMARY: CNBC‚Äôs Jim Cramer stated his unwavering trust in Bitcoin‚Äôs power as a safety net against the US‚Äôs growing $37T debt. His statement comes amid growing concern about the global financial system‚Äôs stability, which casts an economic shadow on future generations. Cramer expressed this exact concern in a recent interview, where he stated: I mean, people want to trade. People want to own some as a hedge against the $37T debt. They don‚Äôt want to own the debt. They want to own Bitcoin for their kids.And you know who else feels that way? Me. ‚Äî Jim Cramer CNBC Interview Cramer‚Äôs gravitation towards Bitcoin isn‚Äôt based on his personal feelings, but rather the observation that the entire financial system is slowly shifting towards the crypto sector. How Bitcoin‚Äôs Influence Grows Among Surging Institutional Adoption Given the growing pro-crypto context, Cramer‚Äôs trust in Bitcoin is very well-placed, with Trump‚Äôs GENIUS Act setting the foundation for a bullish future. The GENIUS Act passed the House this month, leading Trump to sign it into law less than a week ago. The act establishes a solid legal framework for stablecoin issuers, bringing stability and trust into the crypto sector. This aligns with developments like Ripple applying for banking status and JPMorgan supposedly planning to instate Bitcoin and Ethereum-backed loans by 2026 . On top of that, the institutional adoption rate for Bitcoin is growing by the day, with Michael Saylor‚Äôs Strategy now holding 607,770 $BTC and leading a list of 100 institutions with growing Bitcoin reserves. These developments create a powerful pro-Bitcoin and, thus, pro-crypto context where projects like Bitcoin Hyper are almost guaranteed to flourish. How Bitcoin Hyper ($HYPER) Promises to Transform the Bitcoin Ecosystem Bitcoin Hyper ($HYPER) is the Layer 2 solution that aims to tackle Bitcoin‚Äôs most pressing issue: the subpar transaction speed. Bitcoin is currently capped at 7 transactions per second (TPS), miles below modern industry standards. Bitcoin Hyper relies on two tools to boost Bitcoin‚Äôs effectiveness: the Canonical Bridge and the Solana Virtual Machine (SVM). The Canonical Bridge mints the users‚Äô $BTC onto Hyper‚Äôs Layer 2, which they can use within the Hyper ecosystem or withdraw to the native Bitcoin layer when necessary. This contributes to decongesting Bitcoin‚Äôs network traffic, resulting in smoother transactions and decreased confirmation times. The Solana Virtual Machine enables the lightning-fast execution of smart contracts and DeFi apps, further increasing Bitcoin‚Äôs performance, without sacrificing the network‚Äôs security. Bitcoin Hyper has been in presale since May 2025 and has already accumulated over $4.5M, with $HYPER sitting at $0.012375. This rapid growth highlights the investor trust associated with a project that aims to succeed where the Lightning Network failed . For this reason, $HYPER may experience long-term investor support, especially following its successful implementation post-launch. This could translate into a post-listing boom that would force $HYPER to $0.32 or higher. A 5-year successful run could put 2030‚Äôs $HYPER around $1.50 or higher, for an ROI of 12,021%, based on today‚Äôs price. This would transform your $100 investment today into a $12,121 profit by 2030. These are conservative predictions because Bitcoin Hyper could go higher than that, thanks to its association with the Bitcoin network, provided everything goes according to plan. This would make $HYPER one of the most promising new crypto projects of 2025 and beyond. If you want to join the Hyper train, go to the presale page and buy your $HYPER today. Why Bitcoin is Still Bullish, Despite the Drawback Cramer‚Äôs confidence in Bitcoin reflects the general sentiment, despite Bitcoin‚Äôs stagnation and the $86M in outflows recorded recently . The King coin is seemingly impervious to any market drawbacks and seems to be in a consolidation phase that could trigger another sustained bull run. When that happens, projects like Bitcoin Hyper ($HYPER) stand to gain serious traction. Don‚Äôt take this as financial advice. Do your own research (DYOR) and invest wisely.
text: Cramer Warns on $37T U.S. Debt‚ÄîBitcoin Hyper Emerges as a Smart Alternative. CNBC‚Äôs Jim Cramer stated his unwavering trust in Bitcoin‚Äôs power as a safety net against the US‚Äôs growing $37T debt. His statement comes amid growing concern about the global financial system‚Äôs stability, which casts an economic shadow on future generations. Cramer expressed this exact concern in a recent interview, where he stated: I mean, people want to trade. People want to own some as a hedge against the $37T debt. They don‚Äôt want to own the debt. They want to own Bitcoin for their kids.And you know who else feels that way? Me. ‚Äî Jim Cramer CNBC Interview Cramer‚Äôs gravitation towards Bitcoin isn‚Äôt based on his personal feelings, but rather the observation that the entire financial system is slowly shifting towards the crypto sector. How Bitcoin‚Äôs Influence Grows Among Surging Institutional Adoption Given the growing pro-crypto context, Cramer‚Äôs trust in Bitcoin is very well-placed, with Trump‚Äôs GENIUS Act setting the foundation for a bullish future. The GENIUS Act passed the House this month, leading Trump to sign it into law less than a week ago. The act establishes a solid legal framework for stablecoin issuers, bringing stability and trust into the crypto sector. This aligns with developments like Ripple applying for banking status and JPMorgan supposedly planning to instate Bitcoin and Ethereum-backed loans by 2026 . On top of that, the institutional adoption rate for Bitcoin is growing by the day, with Michael Saylor‚Äôs Strategy now holding 607,770 $BTC and leading a list of 100 institutions with growing Bitcoin reserves. These developments create a powerful pro-Bitcoin and, thus, pro-crypto context where projects like Bitcoin Hyper are almost guaranteed to flourish. How Bitcoin Hyper ($HYPER) Promises to Transform the Bitcoin Ecosystem Bitcoin Hyper ($HYPER) is the Layer 2 solution that aims to tackle Bitcoin‚Äôs most pressing issue: the subpar transaction speed. Bitcoin is currently capped at 7 transactions per second (TPS), miles below modern industry standards. Bitcoin Hyper relies on two tools to boost Bitcoin‚Äôs effectiveness: the Canonical Bridge and the Solana Virtual Machine (SVM). The Canonical Bridge mints the users‚Äô $BTC onto Hyper‚Äôs Layer 2, which they can use within the Hyper ecosystem or withdraw to the native Bitcoin layer when necessary. This contributes to decongesting Bitcoin‚Äôs network traffic, resulting in smoother transactions and decreased confirmation times. The Solana Virtual Machine enables the lightning-fast execution of smart contracts and DeFi apps, further increasing Bitcoin‚Äôs performance, without sacrificing the network‚Äôs security. A 5-year successful run could put 2030‚Äôs $HYPER around $1.50 or higher, for an ROI of 12,021%, based on today‚Äôs price. This would transform your $100 investment today into a $12,121 profit by 2030. These are conservative predictions because Bitcoin Hyper could go higher than that, thanks to its association with the Bitcoin network, provided everything goes according to plan. HEADLINE: French Banking Giant Launches Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH) Move! "Target Europe!"
SUMMARY: Societe Generale, the 19th largest bank in the world, has taken an innovative step regarding Bitcoin and Ethereum. Accordingly, French banking giant Societe Generale and ETF issuer 21 Shares have established a partnership. 21Shares announced a partnership with Societe Generale to increase the liquidity of its ETPs in Germany and Eastern Europe. Under this agreement, Societe Generale will provide liquidity and market-making services for 21 Shares'' Bitcoin and Ethereum (ABTC, CBTC, AETH, CETH) ETPs in European markets. The bank will provide over-the-counter (OTC) liquidity to support 21Shares'' Bitcoin and Ethereum trading. This collaboration will see 21Shares'' BTC and ETH products join Societe Generale''s existing market-making platforms. This will now reach a broader audience of professional investors and expand its institutional reach across Europe. Alistair Byas-Perry, global head of investments at 21Shares, said: ‚ÄúWe are excited to partner with Societe Generale, a major player in the European ETF space, as we continue to expand access to our ETPs. By providing liquidity to our Bitcoin and Ethereum ETPs, Societe Generale helps us advance our mission to deliver the most efficient and reliable crypto investment solutions to the market.‚Äù *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: French Banking Giant Launches Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH) Move! "Target Europe!"

HEADLINE: Ethereum Acquisition: BitMine‚Äôs Bold $4.5 Billion Move Reshapes Crypto Investment
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Ethereum Acquisition: BitMine‚Äôs Bold $4.5 Billion Move Reshapes Crypto Investment In a move that has sent ripples across the cryptocurrency landscape, Nasdaq-listed Bitcoin mining company, BitMine Immersion Technologies (BMNR), has significantly amplified its commitment to the Ethereum ecosystem. Announcing a staggering increase in its at-the-market (ATM) offering from an initial $2 billion to an impressive $4.5 billion, BitMine is setting its sights on a massive Ethereum acquisition . This strategic pivot, detailed in a recent U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) filing on July 24, signals a bold new chapter for the company and highlights the evolving dynamics within the digital asset space. For investors, enthusiasts, and market watchers alike, this development raises crucial questions: What does this colossal capital raise mean for BitMine? Why is a prominent Bitcoin miner shifting gears to focus on Ethereum? And what could be the broader implications for the crypto market? Let‚Äôs delve deep into BitMine‚Äôs ambitious strategy and explore the potential ripple effects of this monumental Ethereum acquisition . Ethereum Acquisition: Unpacking BitMine‚Äôs Ambitious Strategy BitMine Immersion Technologies, primarily known for its robust Bitcoin mining operations, is making a clear statement about its long-term vision. The decision to more than double its capital raise specifically for the purpose of acquiring additional Ethereum (ETH) is a testament to the company‚Äôs belief in Ethereum‚Äôs foundational value and future growth potential. This isn‚Äôt just a minor allocation; it‚Äôs a significant reorientation of capital that underscores a strategic diversification play. Traditionally, Bitcoin miners have focused almost exclusively on BTC. However, as the crypto market matures and various blockchain ecosystems evolve, companies like BitMine are exploring new avenues for growth and risk mitigation. The shift towards a substantial Ethereum acquisition could be driven by several factors: Diversification: Spreading investment across different leading cryptocurrencies can reduce reliance on a single asset‚Äôs performance, potentially stabilizing revenue streams and mitigating market-specific risks. Ethereum‚Äôs Ecosystem Growth: Ethereum‚Äôs robust ecosystem, encompassing DeFi, NFTs, and Web3 applications, offers a wide array of opportunities for value appreciation beyond simple price speculation. Transition to Proof-of-Stake (PoS): With Ethereum‚Äôs successful transition to PoS (The Merge), the network‚Äôs energy consumption has drastically reduced, making it more appealing from an ESG (Environmental, Social, and Governance) perspective, and potentially opening doors for staking rewards. This substantial capital infusion via the ATM offering will enable BitMine to execute its Ethereum acquisition on a scale that few traditional mining companies have attempted, positioning them as a major holder of the second-largest cryptocurrency by market capitalization. The Mechanics Behind the Capital Raise: What is an ATM Offering? Understanding how BitMine plans to fund this massive Ethereum acquisition is crucial. An At-The-Market (ATM) offering is a flexible and cost-effective method for publicly traded companies to raise capital by selling new shares directly into the open market at prevailing market prices. Unlike traditional underwritten offerings, ATMs allow companies to raise funds incrementally over time, giving them greater control and flexibility. Here‚Äôs a breakdown of key aspects of an ATM offering: Flexibility: Companies can choose when and how much stock to sell, allowing them to capitalize on favorable market conditions. Cost-Effectiveness: Lower underwriting fees compared to traditional offerings, reducing the overall cost of capital. Market Price Execution: Shares are sold at current market prices, minimizing dilution impact on existing shareholders over a short period, although cumulative sales can still lead to dilution. Transparency: As a public offering, it requires SEC filings, providing transparency to investors about the company‚Äôs intentions and financial activities. BitMine‚Äôs decision to increase its ATM offering to $4.5 billion signifies a strong strategic intent to accumulate a substantial amount of ETH. This method allows them to acquire Ethereum gradually, potentially mitigating the impact of large single-buy orders on market prices, while continuously raising capital as needed for their Ethereum acquisition strategy. Why Ethereum? Understanding BitMine‚Äôs Strategic Rationale While Bitcoin remains the king of cryptocurrencies, Ethereum has carved out its own unique and indispensable niche. BitMine‚Äôs significant investment in ETH suggests a deep understanding of its long-term value proposition beyond just being a digital currency. Here‚Äôs why Ethereum stands out as a compelling asset for such a substantial Ethereum acquisition : Deflationary Mechanics: With EIP-1559 and the Merge, a portion of transac

HEADLINE: Crypto Hype Cools‚ÄîAnalyst Predicts When The Next Altcoin Surge Will Start
SUMMARY: Crypto markets awoke on Wednesday to the first meaningful bout of selling in more than a month, and Kev Capital TA did not sound surprised. In a late-night livestream, the analyst told viewers that Bitcoin‚Äôs failure to clear the ‚Äúbrick-wall‚Äù band between $120,000 and $123,000 had made an altcoin shake-out ‚Äúthe most obvious pullback spot ever,‚Äù capping four straight weeks of euphoric gains across Ethereum, Solana, Dogecoin, XRP and the rest of the sector. Crypto Bulls Crushed: Why Altcoins Ran Out Of Gas ‚ÄúDaily RSIs were at ninety on everything, including ETH, while Bitcoin was pinned under one-twenty,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúThat is a textbook sell wall. You don‚Äôt blast through that after running straight up for a month.‚Äù His chart of Total-2‚Äîthe market-cap index that strips out Bitcoin‚Äîshowed the gauge banging into the exact horizontal ceiling that had turned back altcoins in May, August and November 2021, again in December 2024, and once more in January this year. Each rebuff, he reminded the audience, had sparked corrections of 30-to-60 percent in the majors and far larger drawdowns in the speculative tail. Kev‚Äôs core message was that nothing in the current tape resembles a lasting top for the cycle. The move, he argued, is a pressure-release that clears excess leverage and restores ‚Äúrisk-free long exposure‚Äù for disciplined traders who skimmed profits on the way up. The fulcrum remains Bitcoin. Until the largest asset can establish weekly closes above the 1.0886 Fibonacci extension at $119,964, altcoins will ‚Äúrun out of gas.‚Äù He located initial Bitcoin support at $116,400, with deeper cushions at the $112‚Äì113k band and, in a worst-case flush, the $106.8k shelf. A break below the first of those levels ‚Äúisn‚Äôt necessary‚Äù in his view, but he warned new entrants against treating a ten-percent dip in their favorite microcap as a buying opportunity: ‚ÄúIf Total-2 drops another thirty percent, your altcoin is going down a lot more than ten.‚Äù Why, then, does he remain upbeat? Kev cited a confluence of on-chain and macro tailwinds that, in his back-testing, have never failed to resolve higher. Bitcoin‚Äôs weekly Hash Ribbons flashed a buy signal nine weeks ago and has advanced only eight percent since‚Äîfar below the historical mean of thirty-eight to one-hundred-one percent that materialises two to nine weeks after the trigger. A second, still-pending buy signal is ‚Äúcoming within the next week or two,‚Äù stacking probabilistic odds in favour of a leg higher. Related Reading: Crypto Market‚Äôs Fate Hangs On The Last Days Of July At the same time, he noted, the Federal Reserve‚Äôs quantitative-tightening program is ‚Äúbarely selling anything on the balance sheet,‚Äù while Truth Inflation‚Äôs real-time gauge pins headline CPI at 2.0‚Äì2.1 percent. A spate of tariff de-escalations‚Äîincluding a tentative, across-the-board fifteen-percent cut in EU-US duties announced moments before he went live‚Äîsuggests that inflation risks are skewing lower rather than higher. ‚ÄúAs long as the macro stays quiet‚Äîlow inflation, steady labour market, dovish policy projections‚Äîvaluations can march north,‚Äù he argued, adding that upcoming earnings from Google, Tesla and the rest of Big Tech will feed directly into crypto multiples because ‚Äúthe guidance is correlated whether you like it or not.‚Äù Seasonality is the wild card. August and September are notoriously fickle for risk assets, a period he likened to ‚Äúthe biggest vacation month of the year and then back-to-school.‚Äù Yet he stressed that cyclicality alone cannot trump a supportive macro backdrop. Instead, he expects a period of choppy consolidation‚Äîanchored by Bitcoin‚Äôs tussle with $120k and the golden-pocket bounce in Bitcoin Dominance‚Äîbefore the market‚Äôs next sustained advance. ‚ÄúWe are like the running back; the offensive line has opened the hole, but we haven‚Äôt burst through it yet,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúIf macro stays resilient, this is the year it finally happens.‚Äù His forward timeline therefore hinges on two visible catalysts: A decisive Bitcoin breakout above $123,000. When that prints on a multi-day close, he believes the four-year Total-2 ceiling will snap, unleashing capital rotation back into ETH and the broader alt market. ‚ÄúEverything leads back to Bitcoin,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúCrack that wall and the catch-up trade reignites.‚Äù Related Reading: House Passes Major Bills During ‚ÄòCrypto Week,‚Äô But Significant Changes May Take Time Second is the continuation of the benign macro mix through Q3. Should inflation hold near two percent and the Fed confirm an end-to-QT schedule in its September meeting, Kev projects the next Hash-Ribbons signal will ‚Äúplay out as violently bullish as the model has ever shown,‚Äù delivering what he calls the ‚Äúlast six-month window‚Äù of the cycle. Asked in chat ‚Äúwhen this pullback will be over,‚Äù the analyst refused to pin a date on it. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm not looking at the clock,‚Äù he replied. ‚ÄúTime doesn‚Äôt matter; the levels do.‚Äù Still, his body language betrayed optimism: he plans no further sales, sees no need to add unti

A break below the first of those levels ‚Äúisn‚Äôt necessary‚Äù in his view, but he warned new entrants against treating a ten-percent dip in their favorite microcap as a buying opportunity: ‚ÄúIf Total-2 drops another thirty percent, your altcoin is going down a lot more than ten.‚Äù Why, then, does he remain upbeat? Kev cited a confluence of on-chain and macro tailwinds that, in his back-testing, have never failed to resolve higher. Bitcoin‚Äôs weekly Hash Ribbons flashed a buy signal nine weeks ago and has advanced only eight percent since‚Äîfar below the historical mean of thirty-eight to one-hundred-one percent that materialises two to nine weeks after the trigger. A second, still-pending buy signal is ‚Äúcoming within the next week or two,‚Äù stacking probabilistic odds in favour of a leg higher. Related Reading: Crypto Market‚Äôs Fate Hangs On The Last Days Of July At the same time, he noted, the Federal Reserve‚Äôs quantitative-tightening program is ‚Äúbarely selling anything on the balance sheet,‚Äù while Truth Inflation‚Äôs real-time gauge pins headline CPI at 2.0‚Äì2.1 percent. A spate of tariff de-escalations‚Äîincluding a tentative, across-the-board fifteen-percent cut in EU-US duties announced moments before he went live‚Äîsuggests that inflation risks are skewing lower rather than higher. ‚ÄúAs long as the macro stays quiet‚Äîlow inflation, steady labour market, dovish policy projections‚Äîvaluations can march north,‚Äù he argued, adding that upcoming earnings from Google, Tesla and the rest of Big Tech will feed directly into crypto multiples because ‚Äúthe guidance is correlated whether you like it or not.‚Äù Seasonality is the wild card. August and September are notoriously fickle for risk assets, a period he likened to ‚Äúthe biggest vacation month of the year and then back-to-school.‚Äù Yet he stressed that cyclicality alone cannot trump a supportive macro backdrop. Instead, he expects a period of choppy consolidation‚Äîanchored by Bitcoin‚Äôs tussle with $120k and the golden-pocket bounce in Bitcoin Dominance‚Äîbefore the market‚Äôs next sustained advance. ‚ÄúWe are like the running back; the offensive line has opened the hole, but we haven‚Äôt burst through it yet,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúIf macro stays resilient, this is the year it finally happens.‚Äù His forward timeline therefore hinges on two visible catalysts: A decisive Bitcoin breakout above $123,000. When that prints on a multi-day close, he believes the four-year Total-2 ceiling will snap, unleashing capital rotation back into ETH and the broader alt market. ‚ÄúEverything leads back to Bitcoin,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúCrack that wall and the catch-up trade reignites.‚Äù Related Reading: House Passes Major Bills During ‚ÄòCrypto Week,‚Äô But Significant Changes May Take Time Second is the continuation of the benign macro mix through Q3. Should inflation hold near two percent and the Fed confirm an end-to-QT schedule in its September meeting, Kev projects the next Hash-Ribbons signal will ‚Äúplay out as violently bullish as the model has ever shown,‚Äù delivering what he calls the ‚Äúlast six-month window‚Äù of the cycle. Asked in chat ‚Äúwhen this pullback will be over,‚Äù the analyst refused to pin a date on it. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm not looking at the clock,‚Äù he replied. ‚ÄúTime doesn‚Äôt matter; the levels do.‚Äù Still, his body language betrayed optimism: he plans no further sales, sees no need to add unti

HEADLINE: Bitzero raises $25M to expand clean crypto mining and data centres
SUMMARY: Bitzero, the clean energy crypto mining company backed by Shark Tank investor Kevin O‚ÄôLeary, has raised $25 million to accelerate its growth across North America and Europe. The funds will support the purchase and deployment of 2,900 Bitmain S21 Pro miners over the next four to six months, a move expected to boost annual revenue by $10 million. Unlike most miners, Bitzero owns its entire infrastructure‚Äîincluding land, energy sources, and equipment‚Äîpositioning it for long-term sustainability. The firm also plans to expand its role as a green infrastructure provider for AI and cloud services beyond Bitcoin mining. New hardware expected to generate $10 million annually Bitzero‚Äôs latest funding round will enable the purchase of 2,900 high-efficiency Bitmain S21 Pro miners. According to the company, the machines will be installed within four to six months and are expected to contribute an additional $10 million in annual revenue. The new hardware also aims to lower Bitzero‚Äôs breakeven point, improving profit margins in an increasingly competitive mining market. The firm operates in cold-climate regions like Norway, Finland, and North Dakota, where lower temperatures reduce energy needs and costs. These areas also offer access to low-carbon, renewable power, helping Bitzero maintain environmentally conscious operations while enhancing long-term profitability. Bitzero owns its land, energy, and facilities In an industry where many miners rent space from third-party data centres, Bitzero has adopted a fully integrated model. The company owns its physical assets, including the energy infrastructure that powers its mining and computing operations. This level of control enables better management of operational costs and scalability. This infrastructure-focused approach has become a strategic differentiator. By reducing reliance on external providers and minimising exposure to fluctuating energy prices, Bitzero has created a more stable and efficient business model. The current expansion will further consolidate its position in the clean mining and data centre sectors. Data centre buildout aims to serve AI and cloud clients Bitzero‚Äôs plans go beyond Bitcoin mining. The company is constructing four large-scale data centres across its locations in Norway, Finland, and North Dakota. These are designed to meet the growing demand for high-performance computing needed in artificial intelligence, cloud storage, and enterprise IT. The upcoming facilities are intended to deliver computing power with minimal environmental impact, aligning with Bitzero‚Äôs commitment to sustainable infrastructure. The company positions itself as a ‚Äúclean infrastructure provider‚Äù focused on long-term utility across emerging technology ecosystems. Kevin O‚ÄôLeary backs Bitcoin over Ethereum Investor Kevin O‚ÄôLeary, who has invested in Bitzero, continues to favour Bitcoin over other digital assets. Speaking to CoinDesk , he described Bitcoin as the go-to asset for those seeking crypto exposure, stating that many investors choose Bitcoin alone for its proven volatility and value proposition. O‚ÄôLeary also expressed scepticism about Ethereum‚Äôs performance, criticising it for being ‚Äúslow‚Äù and inefficient under heavy transaction loads. The post Bitzero raises $25M to expand clean crypto mining and data centres appeared first on Invezz

HEADLINE: Google Integrates with Self, Leveling Up Enterprise ZK Adoption
SUMMARY: ZK-powered identity protocol Self says it has joined hands with Google Cloud to fuel adoption of its Web3 infrastructure and AI tooling among verified human users. According to the press release, the partners aim to support the Web3 developer ecosystem with new AI capabilities. Namely, they will explore ways to integrate the Self Protocol with AI search tools in its Web3 Portal. Also, Google Cloud‚Äôs Testnet Faucet will integrate with Self‚Äôs proof-of-humanity zero-knowledge proofs (ZKPs) for Sybil resistance. The latter refers to methods to prevent or mitigate Sybil attacks, where a malicious entity uses numerous fake identities/nodes to gain control over a network. And lastly, Google Cloud will launch ‚Äúa first-of-its-kind‚Äù Mainnet Faucet offering. To enable sanctions screening, it will use Self‚Äôs exclusion proofs from its OFAC list. Office of Foreign Assets Control (OFAC) is a division of the US Department of the Treasury that administers and enforces economic and trade sanctions. 2/ Self, a ZK-powered identity protocol that enables users to prove their humanity & unique attributes w/o revealing personal data, announces a new partnership w/ Google Cloud‚Äì‚Äìwhat does this mean? ‚Äî Self Protocol (@SelfProtocol) July 23, 2025 According to Richard Widmann, Head of Strategy for Web3 at Google Cloud, ‚Äúthe acceleration of AI in the Web3 developer ecosystem is lowering the barrier to entry for developers building in this space.‚Äù Google Cloud‚Äôs works with Celo and Self to bring together ZKP-enabled identity technology with Web3 developer tools on the Google Cloud Web3 Portal. This will ‚Äúdemonstrate the value and timeliness of these technologies,‚Äù Widmann argues. Speaking of which, while Self supports offchain and onchain attestations, the latter happen on the Celo blockchain. Google Cloud has been a Celo partner since 2018. It has supported its development and sustainability-focused startups within the ecosystem, while also running a validator. A network validator participates in the verification of new transactions, thus helping secure the network against attacks. It''s official‚Äì‚Äìthe @googlecloud & @CeloOrg partnership continues! Importantly, @googlecloud is running a validator on the Celo network, helping to strengthen the network‚Äôs security. pic.twitter.com/vTzadH8t1d ‚Äî Celo.eth/acc (@Celo) August 2, 2023 You may also like: Google Cloud Becomes a Validator for the Injective Network Millions of crypto holders have learned the hard way that self-custody, while empowering, can also be unforgiving. Losing a recovery phrase means losing the assets tied to it permanently. Despite the sophistication of hardware wallets, the weakest link often remains the way people back up their 24-word seed phrase. For years, that backup has meant writing it down, hiding it away, and hoping nothing goes wrong.This is where the Ledger backup device comes in. Ledger‚Äôs newest release aims to... ‚Äò1 Billion Biometric Passport Holders‚Äô The Self team says that it‚Äôs audited by third-party zkSecurity . They state that the zero-knowledge technology ensures safety and privacy. No single person or entity, including the protocol developers, can access users‚Äô data, they claim. Information is also not stored with a third entity. Moreover, the protocol utilizes zk-SNARK (Zero-Knowledge Succinct Non-interactive Argument of Knowledge) cryptography to prove they are humans. This also allows them to reveal certain less sensitive data, if they choose so. For example, they can reveal their age but not their date of birth, the team says. Moreover, Self reports over 8 million users, 1 billion biometric passport holders from 129 countries, and ‚Äútens of millions‚Äù of biometric ID holders across 27 EU countries, Turkey, Ukraine, Vietnam, Ghana, and Saudi Arabia. 5/ Self also supports offchain & onchain attestations, w/ onchain attestations occurring on @Celo , where Google Cloud ran a validator & has supported development of the protocol and sustainability-focused ecosystem projects since 2018 https://t.co/fT11NQG7wh ‚Äî Self Protocol (@SelfProtocol) July 23, 2025 Now, this latest Self-Google Cloud partnership ‚Äúmarks an ongoing commitment‚Äù by the two teams ‚Äúto promote the privacy and protection of users by harnessing cryptographic ZKPs, as with its announcement to enhance Google Wallets in the UK for age verification (April 2025), and more recently, to promote privacy in supporting EU age assurance (July 2025).‚Äù Self co-founder Marek Olszewski commented that they are ‚Äúhonored that Google chose our SDK to provide secure, privacy-first identity solutions, and to further drive AI and Web3 innovation for real people.‚Äù You may also like: CME Group and Google Cloud Pilot Asset Tokenization Solutions CME Group, a US-based derivatives marketplace, and Google Cloud have partnered to pilot solutions for secure wholesale payments and asset tokenization using Google Cloud Universal Ledger (GCUL).CME Group has already completed the initial integration and testing phase of GCUL, ac

HEADLINE: XRP Holds Strong Above 50-Day EMA Amid Market Cooldown
SUMMARY: What‚Äôs Cooking for XRP? According to Vlad Hyrniv, altcoin sentiment is cooling as Bitcoin dominance climbs, with the Altcoin Season Index dropping to 37, which is below the 75 threshold that signals an alt season. The market analyst believes that this is one of the reasons why XRP has pulled back to the $3.13 zone. Nevertheless, all hope is not lost because the 3rd-largest cryptocurrency by market cap is still holding strong above the 50-day EMA at $2.64. Furthermore, the relative strength index (RSI) is at around 55, hinting at a pause not a breakdown because momentum remains neutral. Therefore, XRP is showing strength by holding above the crucial 50-day EMA, a technical indicator widely used to gauge mid-term momentum and trend health. Notably, the resilience above the 50-day EMA signals that bullish sentiment remains intact. The market may be witnessing a healthy pullback rather than the start of a broader trend reversal. Historically, corrections of this nature have provided opportunities for re-accumulation, especially when price remains anchored above key moving averages. Technical analysts point to a larger Elliott Wave structure unfolding, with the recent drop likely forming part of a Wave 4 correction. According to crypto strategist Man of Bitcoin, a sustained close above $3.25 could mark the completion of this corrective phase, paving the way for Wave 5 that could push XRP to a new high of $5.50. The fact that price has not breached the 50-day EMA supports this bullish scenario. On-chain data also backs XRP‚Äôs underlying strength. XRP Ledger wallets have surged to 7.24 million amid growing interest in its DeFi capabilities and cross-border use cases. Daily active addresses remain elevated, and whale accumulation continues despite the price drop, indicating confidence among large holders. Conclusion While XRP‚Äôs 16.61% drop from its ATH may appear bearish on the surface, the broader picture shows an asset undergoing a standard market correction. As long as XRP holds above the 50-day EMA, the path of least resistance remains upward, making the current zone a potential launchpad for the next leg higher. Traders are now watching the $3.25 level closely for confirmation of renewed bullish momentum.

HEADLINE: Crypto Firms Raise Billions for Treasuries, But Aren‚Äôt Really Buying Crypto: Report
SUMMARY: A growing number of publicly traded companies are raising hundreds of millions of dollars to build crypto treasuries, but one analyst says many aren‚Äôt actually buying digital assets from the open market. Key Takeaways: Crypto treasury firms often receive insider crypto contributions instead of buying from the open market. These models allow early contributors to cash out at a premium once stocks surge. Analyst Ran Neuner warns the trend could mirror past bubbles, with retail investors left holding inflated shares. The crypto treasury trend took off after MicroStrategy‚Äôs headline-making Bitcoin purchases in 2020. Since then, companies like SharpLink Gaming, Upexi, and GameStop have announced multi-million or even billion-dollar fundraising efforts to build Ethereum, Solana, or Bitcoin treasuries. Yet, crypto prices remain relatively stable despite this supposed influx of demand. Crypto Treasuries Are Just Exit Vehicles for Insiders Talking to Forbes, crypto analyst Ran Neuner claimed that crypto treasury firms are acting less like buyers and more like exit vehicles for crypto insiders . Instead of purchasing assets directly from exchanges, these companies often receive crypto contributions from existing holders, in exchange for shares that later trade at massive premiums on public markets. For example, SharpLink‚Äôs $425 million Ethereum treasury wasn‚Äôt funded by institutions. According to Neuner, crypto holders contributed ETH in return for shares at net asset value. Once the company publicly declared itself an Ethereum treasury firm, the stock surged, giving early contributors a chance to cash out with significant upside. ‚ÄúAs soon as we announce to the market that this company is an ETH treasury company, the shares that you got at net asset value are going to be worth three times net asset value,‚Äù he said. https://twitter.com/gametheorizing/status/1946162921844756985 It‚Äôs a pattern that‚Äôs repeated across other firms. Upexi raised over $300 million while claiming to have acquired 1.9 million SOL . Bit Origin wants to raise $500 million for Dogecoin. GameStop allegedly converted $1.5 billion in debt into Bitcoin . Neuner said little of that activity appears to come from actual market buying. The underlying model benefits insiders as they get liquidity, regulatory legitimacy, and tax efficiency ‚Äî all while avoiding the price impact of selling on exchanges. Meanwhile, retail investors often end up paying 2-4x the net asset value for these stocks. Neuner warned that this is like a new form of leverage in crypto. Like past bubbles, he believes this treasury craze may burst just as suddenly. Doubts Grow Over Long-Term Viability of Bitcoin Treasury Strategy Skepticism around the sustainability of the Bitcoin treasury trend is growing. Last month, Glassnode lead analyst James Check raised concerns over the longevity of the corporate Bitcoin treasury strategy, arguing the easy gains might already be gone for new entrants as the market matures. The warning echoes recent comments from Matthew Sigel, head of digital asset research at VanEck, who has voiced concerns over the Bitcoin treasury strategies adopted by some publicly traded firms. Sigel singled out the use of at-the-market (ATM) share issuance programs, arguing that these can become dilutive if a company‚Äôs stock price nears its Bitcoin net asset value (NAV). The post Crypto Firms Raise Billions for Treasuries, But Aren‚Äôt Really Buying Crypto: Report appeared first on Cryptonews .

HEADLINE: BREAKING: MicroStrategy Makes Another Major Bitcoin Move
SUMMARY: According to breaking information reported by Bloomberg, MicroStrategy is planning a massive fundraising campaign for Bitcoin purchases, increasing the amount from the previous $500 million to $2 billion. The company increased its preferred share sale, initially planned at $500 million, to $2 billion due to investor demand. MicroStrategy''s new ‚ÄúSeries A Perpetual Stretch‚Äù preferred shares will be priced at noon New York time today, sources familiar with the matter told Bloomberg. Shares will sell for $90 each, the lower end of the marketing range and a discount to the $100 face value. The shares will initially carry a 9% annual dividend. Related News: BREAKING: Important Development for Toncoin (TON) - Ton Foundation Announces Major TON Treasury Partnership with a Company The sale is being organized by Morgan Stanley, Barclays, Moelis & Co., and TD Securities. The sale also includes the issuance of 5 million preferred shares, according to Bloomberg. These newly issued preferred shares are structured to rank above MicroStrategy''s Strike and Stride series shares and common stock, but below its previously issued Strife series preferred shares and convertible notes. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: BREAKING: MicroStrategy Makes Another Major Bitcoin Move

HEADLINE: Bitcoin Price Soars: Unpacking the Monumental Surge Above $119,000
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin Price Soars: Unpacking the Monumental Surge Above $119,000 The cryptocurrency world is abuzz as the Bitcoin price has once again demonstrated its incredible potential, soaring past the significant $119,000 mark. According to Bitcoin World market monitoring and data from the Binance USDT market, BTC is currently trading at an impressive $119,060.4. This surge has captivated investors and analysts, prompting discussions about its drivers and Bitcoin‚Äôs future. Decoding Bitcoin‚Äôs Ascent: What Does This Significant Bitcoin Price Signify? When the Bitcoin price breaks through key resistance levels, it often signals a shift in market sentiment and potentially the start of a new rally. The move above $119,000 is more than just a number; it represents renewed confidence and strong buying pressure. Understanding these drivers is crucial for anyone looking to navigate the volatile yet rewarding crypto landscape. Several factors typically contribute to such a significant upward movement in the Bitcoin price . These can include a mix of macroeconomic trends, increasing institutional adoption, technological advancements, and shifts in investor psychology. Let‚Äôs delve into some of the key catalysts fueling this latest surge: Institutional Inflow: Growing interest from large financial institutions and corporations, who are increasingly allocating portions of their portfolios to Bitcoin, provides substantial buying power and legitimacy. Halving Narrative: The anticipation and aftermath of Bitcoin‚Äôs halving events often lead to supply shocks, which historically have preceded significant price increases due to reduced new supply. Macroeconomic Climate: Global economic uncertainties, inflation concerns, and a weakening fiat currency environment can push investors towards Bitcoin as a perceived hedge or ‚Äòdigital gold‚Äô. Positive Market Sentiment: A general wave of optimism, fueled by positive news, influencer endorsements, or successful project developments within the broader crypto ecosystem, can create a ‚Äòfear of missing out‚Äô (FOMO) effect. Technical Breakouts: Chart patterns and technical indicators often signal potential upward movements, attracting algorithmic trading and short covering. This confluence of factors creates a powerful upward momentum, pushing the Bitcoin price to new heights and drawing fresh attention from both seasoned traders and new entrants. The Road to $119,000: A Look at Bitcoin‚Äôs Historical Journey and Volatility Bitcoin‚Äôs journey has been nothing short of a roller coaster, marked by exhilarating highs and stomach-churning lows. From its humble beginnings as a niche digital currency, it has evolved into a global asset class, commanding significant attention from mainstream finance. The current Bitcoin price of over $119,000 stands as a testament to its resilience and long-term growth trajectory, despite its inherent volatility. Historically, Bitcoin has shown a remarkable ability to recover from significant corrections, often reaching new all-time highs. This pattern has cemented its reputation among many as a store of value and a high-growth asset. Understanding this historical context helps put the current surge into perspective and provides insights into Bitcoin‚Äôs unique market behavior. Key Periods in Bitcoin‚Äôs History Significant Price Movement Driving Factors Early Years (2009-2013) From fractions of a cent to hundreds of dollars Niche adoption, early enthusiast interest, first media attention. 2017 Bull Run From under $1,000 to nearly $20,000 Increased public awareness, retail investor FOMO, ICO boom. 2020-2021 Rally From ~$10,000 to over $60,000 Institutional adoption, corporate treasury allocations, pandemic-era stimulus. Current Surge (e.g., above $119,000) Reaching new highs Spot ETF approvals, continued institutional interest, positive regulatory signals. This historical context highlights Bitcoin‚Äôs cyclical nature and its capacity for significant price appreciation, making the current Bitcoin price surge a familiar yet exciting development for long-term observers. Navigating the Volatility: Opportunities and Challenges for Bitcoin Investors The exhilarating rise in Bitcoin price naturally brings both immense opportunities and considerable challenges for investors. It‚Äôs essential to approach the market with a clear understanding of both sides of the coin, especially when dealing with an asset as dynamic as Bitcoin. Opportunities Presented by the Surging Bitcoin Price: High Growth Potential: Bitcoin has historically offered some of the highest returns among asset classes, making it attractive for investors seeking significant capital appreciation. Portfolio Diversification: For some, Bitcoin can act as a non-correlated asset, potentially providing diversification benefits against traditional financial markets. Innovation and Adoption: The underlying blockchain technology continues to evolve, leading to new use cases and increased mainstream adoption, which can further b

HEADLINE: Kevin O‚ÄôLeary-Backed Bitzero Raises $25M to Scale Crypto Mining Operations
SUMMARY: Bitzero, the crypto mining company supported by investor and TV personality Kevin O‚ÄôLeary, has raised $25 million to accelerate the expansion of its mining infrastructure. Key Takeaways: Bitzero secured $25 million to expand its crypto mining operations with energy-efficient hardware. The company plans to deploy 2,900 miners, generating an estimated $10 million in annual revenue. Bitzero continues to position itself as a leader in sustainable mining. The fresh funding will go toward the purchase of 2,900 Bitmain S21 Pro miners, which are high-performance machines known for their energy efficiency, operating at 15 joules per terahash, the company announced Wednesday . Bitzero said deployment is expected within four to six months and is projected to bring in approximately $10 million in additional annual revenue. Bitzero Keeps Backers Under Wraps as It Scales Sustainable Crypto Mining While the company did not disclose the investors behind the deal, it emphasized that the capital would help drive profitability and scale its operations in line with its sustainability mission. Bitzero has positioned itself as a clean energy player in a sector frequently criticized for its environmental impact. Its data center in Namsskogan, Norway, runs exclusively on hydropower, aligning with the company‚Äôs broader strategy to balance profitability with environmental and community interests. ‚ÄúOur mission has always been to prove that Blockchain infrastructure can thrive in harmony with investors, communities, and the environment,‚Äù said Mohammed Bakhashwain, Bitzero‚Äôs President and CEO. Here‚Äôs how the Bitcoin Mining Industry has compared against $BTC This is honestly pretty insane. pic.twitter.com/nH6DZBKYxB ‚Äî Magnus (@BTCMiningNewz) July 23, 2025 The mining firm‚Äôs presence in Europe has already demonstrated the potential of clean energy-driven mining. With the latest funding round, Bitzero is aiming to further cement its role as a leader in sustainable crypto infrastructure ‚Äî a narrative that‚Äôs gaining momentum amid the broader push for greener blockchain operations. Chinese Roots Still Dominate Global Bitcoin Mining As reported, over half of the world‚Äôs Bitcoin mining operations still trace their origins to China , with 55% to 65% of mining linked to Chinese capital, hardware, or expertise, according to Uminers CEO Batyr Hydyrov. Despite China‚Äôs 2021 mining ban, key Chinese players have maintained influence by relocating operations overseas. Major Chinese manufacturers Bitmain, Canaan, and MicroBT, responsible for 99% of Bitcoin mining hardware, have shifted production to the U.S. to avoid tariffs, helping boost America‚Äôs share of Bitcoin‚Äôs total hashrate from 4% in 2019 to 38% today. Hydyrov added that former Chinese miners have often increased capacity after moving abroad, with some expanding by up to 150%, and noted that limited mining still persists within China‚Äôs remote regions where enforcement is lax. Meanwhile, earlier this month, a solo Bitcoin miner defied extraordinary odds, successfully mining an entire block and earning just under $350,000 in Bitcoin rewards. The miner, working through the CKpool solo mining pool, used a rig producing 2.3 petahashes per second (PH/s) to solve block 903883. The post Kevin O‚ÄôLeary-Backed Bitzero Raises $25M to Scale Crypto Mining Operations appeared first on Cryptonews .

HEADLINE: Ghana regulators move forward to cover $3 billion domestic crypto sector
SUMMARY: Ghana is preparing to introduce its first regulatory framework for cryptocurrency as usage of digital assets in the country surges to $3 billion . The Bank of Ghana (BoG) is expected to present a bill to parliament in September to oversee and regulate digital asset exchanges. BoG Governor Johnson Asiama said the main objective is to bring virtual currencies into the mainstream economy. He emphasized that the move would help the country collect reliable economic data, enhance transparency, attract investment, and generate revenue for the national budget. Asiama admitted they are now playing catch-up, noting that many Ghanaians already use cryptocurrencies to send and receive payments . However, most of these transactions remain invisible to regulators, making it difficult to measure the full scope of the country‚Äôs economic activity. According to Asiama, integrating crypto into the formal financial system is now critical, as millions of Ghanaians have already adopted it daily. The proposed bill will outline operational standards for digital asset platforms, detail consumer protection mechanisms, and establish tax obligations. It is also expected to strengthen financial oversight amid increasing concerns over money laundering and cross-border fraud. Ghana‚Äôs move reflects a broader trend across Africa, where governments are waking up to the reality that cryptocurrency is more than a passing trend. By licensing crypto platforms, Ghana hopes to tap into one of the fastest-growing sectors of its digital economy. Regulators target currency stability Ghana‚Äôs move to regulate cryptocurrency could also stabilize the Ghanaian cedi in the longer term, as the local currency has exhibited extreme volatility in recent years. The currency has appreciated by 48% in the last 12 months. But the increase came after it posted a steep drop of 25% in the preceding year, underscoring its volatility. This unpredictability makes monetary policy more challenging, particularly for Ghana, which heavily relies on imports. According to officials, regulating crypto would help the central bank better forecast and steer inflation. Governor Asiama explained that some of the capital flows in and out of the economy through cryptocurrencies were not captured in the country‚Äôs official data. He said this limited the central bank‚Äôs ability to make accurate economic decisions and impacted the cedi‚Äôs value. Now Ghana has a benchmark interest rate of 28%, and inflation fell to 13.7% in June. This wide differential indicates underlying economic dislocations that the BoG aims to alleviate with better data collection and financial inclusion. By regulating cryptocurrency, Ghana can better track money flows, monitor macroeconomic trends, and plan for long-term financial stability. It will also give the central bank greater visibility into how much crypto is being held, traded, or converted into foreign currency by individuals and businesses. Ghanaians and Nigerians lead surge in crypto use Web3 Africa Group‚Äôs chief executive officer, Del Titus Bawuah, said about 3 million Ghanaians ‚Äî or 17% of all adults in the country ‚Äî use virtual currencies. This includes Bitcoin, Ethereum, and stablecoins like USDT. Bawuah said the data showed that Ghanaians used cryptocurrencies for much more than just investment. He noted that people are paying for everyday services, sending money, and running businesses with crypto. He emphasized that it is no longer a niche trend but has become mainstream. According to Bawuah , traded crypto transactions in Ghana totaled $3 billion between July 2023 and June 2024. Nigeria recorded an even higher volume at $59 billion in crypto trades during the same period. Nigeria represents about half of sub-Saharan Africa‚Äôs $125 billion crypto volume. Observers say one reason for the boom is a lack of faith in the traditional banking system, and a difficulty getting hold of U.S. dollars. Crypto is a solution, at least for cross-border payments and e-commerce. Crypto could also help to improve regional trade by circumventing currency exchange barriers, said Craig Stoehr, general counsel at pan-African stablecoin payments platform Yellow Card. HEADLINE: BitMine becomes the biggest corporate ETH holder in the world as stash tops $2 billion
SUMMARY: BitMine now holds over $2 billion worth of Ethereum, becoming the single biggest ETH holder in the world. This was confirmed when the company‚Äôs ETH stash hit 566,776, valued at $3,643.752 per coin. The surge comes just sixteen days after BitMine closed a $250 million private placement on July 8, the first major step in what it calls its asset-light treasury strategy. BitMine‚Äôs chairman, Thomas ‚ÄúTom‚Äù Lee, who also co-founded Fundstrat, said the company isn‚Äôt slowing down. ‚ÄúAt BitMine, we surpassed $2 billion in ETH holdings, just sixteen days after closing on the initial $250 million private placement,‚Äù Tom said . ‚ÄúWe are well on our way to achieving our goal of acquiring and staking 5% of the overall ETH supply.‚Äù That 5% target equals nearly six million ETH, and BitMine says they‚Äôre actively working toward it. BitMine plans to hold through diverse Ethereum setups BitMine‚Äôs strategy focuses on growing ETH held per share. They plan to do this by using company cash flows, smart capital market moves, and earnings from staking. Volatility, according to them, is an opportunity, not a problem. And they say their strategy also counts on ETH‚Äôs price gains to help grow the value of what they already hold. CEO Jonathan Bates doubled down on this focus. ‚ÄúWe are committed to Ethereum‚Äôs continued growth and look forward to advancing our Ethereum treasury strategy,‚Äù Jonathan said. Meanwhile, Ethereum itself is breaking out. After rising past $3,800, analysts say the chart now looks a lot like 2016-2017, just before the coin jumped 5,000% in less than twelve months. In that earlier cycle, ETH struggled for months while Bitcoin took the spotlight, then dropped almost 50%, faked out traders twice, and finally blasted through resistance. That same setup appears to have played out again. Crypto analyst Merlijn The Trader shared a comparison chart on X (formerly Twitter), showing nearly identical price patterns: a long range, two fakeouts, a sharp dip, and now a breakout. In 2017, ETH moved from under $8 to more than $250 within a year. If the pattern repeats in 2025, ETH could hit $40,000. Cryptopolitan Academy: Want to grow your money in 2025? Learn how to do it with DeFi in our upcoming webclass. Save Your Spot

HEADLINE: Ghana‚Äôs Central Bank Initiates Move to Regulate the Crypto Industry
SUMMARY: Ghana‚Äôs central bank is drafting new crypto laws. Virtual asset operators would soon need licenses to operate in Ghana. The new crypto laws will cover anti-money laundering and user protection policies. Ghana‚Äôs Central Bank is set to present a draft regulatory framework to address the nation‚Äôs cryptocurrency ecosystem, according to a Bloomberg report . If passed, the new rules would allow the regulator to issue licenses to virtual asset firms operating in Ghana and would mark a major shift in the government‚Äôs official perspective on crypto. Crypto isn‚Äôt so new in Ghana While the proposed law is new, cryptocurrency has already gained significant traction in Ghana, with over three million adults representing 17% of the West African country‚Äôs population, are already using the technology. Most of these users engage with Bitcoin and the USDT stablecoin for both investment and transactions. Related: Turkey Prepares Stricter Crypto Regulations to Combat Financial Crime Ghana‚Äôs limitations in traditional banking remain a significant factor in the growing adoption of cryptocurrency. text: Ghana‚Äôs Central Bank Initiates Move to Regulate the Crypto Industry. Ghana‚Äôs central bank is drafting new crypto laws. Virtual asset operators would soon need licenses to operate in Ghana. The new crypto laws will cover anti-money laundering and user protection policies. Ghana‚Äôs Central Bank is set to present a draft regulatory framework to address the nation‚Äôs cryptocurrency ecosystem, according to a Bloomberg report . If passed, the new rules would allow the regulator to issue licenses to virtual asset firms operating in Ghana and would mark a major shift in the government‚Äôs official perspective on crypto. Crypto isn‚Äôt so new in Ghana While the proposed law is new, cryptocurrency has already gained significant traction in Ghana, with over three million adults representing 17% of the West African country‚Äôs population, are already using the technology. Most of these users engage with Bitcoin and the USDT stablecoin for both investment and transactions. HEADLINE: Bitcoin: MicroStrategy Unleashes Monumental $2 Billion Purchase Plan
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin: MicroStrategy Unleashes Monumental $2 Billion Purchase Plan In a move that has sent ripples across the financial world, MicroStrategy (MSTR), the pioneering business intelligence firm turned Bitcoin maximalist, has announced a dramatic increase in its planned capital raise. Originally targeting $500 million, the company now aims to secure a staggering $2 billion to fund additional Bitcoin purchases. This monumental decision underscores MicroStrategy‚Äôs unwavering commitment to its digital asset strategy and its profound belief in the long-term value of Bitcoin . What‚Äôs Driving MicroStrategy‚Äôs Bold Bitcoin Ambition? MicroStrategy‚Äôs journey into the world of Bitcoin began in August 2020, when it adopted the cryptocurrency as its primary treasury reserve asset. Since then, under the leadership of its co-founder and former CEO, Michael Saylor, the company has consistently acquired more Bitcoin , establishing itself as the largest corporate holder of the digital asset. This latest announcement, significantly upsizing their offering, is a testament to their continued conviction. Strategic Vision: MicroStrategy views Bitcoin as a superior store of value, a hedge against inflation, and a long-term investment that outperforms traditional assets. Market Opportunity: The current market dynamics, including growing institutional interest and the halving event, may present what MicroStrategy perceives as opportune moments for accumulation. Shareholder Value: The company believes that holding Bitcoin directly enhances shareholder value by providing exposure to a rapidly appreciating asset class. This aggressive expansion of their Bitcoin acquisition strategy isn‚Äôt just about accumulating more coins; it‚Äôs about solidifying MicroStrategy‚Äôs unique position as a publicly traded proxy for Bitcoin investment. The initial $500 million target was already ambitious, but doubling down to $2 billion signals an even deeper commitment and a more aggressive stance in the ongoing digital asset revolution. The Mechanics Behind the Massive Bitcoin Offering To finance its substantial Bitcoin acquisitions, MicroStrategy typically utilizes various capital-raising methods, primarily through the issuance of convertible senior notes or equity offerings. These methods allow the company to raise significant capital without immediately diluting existing shareholders (in the case of convertible notes) or by attracting new investors specifically interested in their Bitcoin -centric strategy. While the specific details of this $2 billion offering are still unfolding, it is likely to follow a similar pattern. Convertible senior notes are a popular choice for MicroStrategy because they offer: Lower Interest Rates: Often, these notes come with lower interest rates compared to traditional debt, given the conversion feature. Deferred Dilution: Share dilution only occurs if the notes are converted into equity, usually at a premium to the current stock price. Flexibility: They provide a flexible financing tool that can be tailored to market conditions. This financial engineering allows MicroStrategy to leverage its balance sheet to acquire more Bitcoin , betting on the future appreciation of the digital asset to more than offset the cost of capital. It‚Äôs a bold financial maneuver that intertwines corporate finance with the volatile, yet potentially lucrative, world of cryptocurrency. Why Bitcoin? Unpacking MicroStrategy‚Äôs Investment Thesis At the heart of MicroStrategy‚Äôs strategy is a profound belief in Bitcoin ‚Äòs foundational principles and its future as a global reserve asset. Michael Saylor has consistently articulated a clear investment thesis for Bitcoin , which resonates with many proponents of digital assets: Core Tenet Explanation Digital Gold Bitcoin is seen as a scarce, immutable, and decentralized store of value, akin to digital gold, that is superior to traditional fiat currencies susceptible to inflation. Inflation Hedge With its fixed supply cap of 21 million coins, Bitcoin is considered a robust hedge against the devaluation of fiat currencies due to quantitative easing and rising inflation. Global Network Bitcoin operates on a decentralized, secure, and globally accessible network, making it a borderless asset for the digital age. Technological Innovation The underlying blockchain technology represents a significant technological leap, offering transparency and security. MicroStrategy‚Äôs conviction is rooted in the belief that Bitcoin ‚Äòs network effect, increasing adoption, and programmatic scarcity will lead to substantial long-term value appreciation. They view temporary price fluctuations as opportunities for accumulation, rather than reasons for concern, reinforcing their long-term ‚ÄòHODL‚Äô strategy. What Are the Potential Impacts on the Bitcoin Market? MicroStrategy‚Äôs significant capital raise and subsequent Bitcoin purchases have several potential implications for the broader cryptocurrency market: Increased Instituti

HEADLINE: Ethereum Price: Why ETH is Poised for an Explosive Ascent
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Ethereum Price: Why ETH is Poised for an Explosive Ascent The cryptocurrency market is always buzzing with activity, and recently, all eyes have been on Ethereum. As the digital asset recovers to the significant $3,600 mark, many are asking: Is this just the beginning? The current sentiment around the Ethereum price suggests a robust potential for further upside, a view echoed by various analysts. Let‚Äôs dive deep into the indicators and expert opinions that paint a promising picture for ETH‚Äôs trajectory. Understanding the Ethereum Price Resurgence: What‚Äôs Driving It? The journey of Ethereum, from its recent lows to breaching the $3,600 level, has captivated investors and enthusiasts alike. This resurgence isn‚Äôt merely a fleeting moment; it‚Äôs underpinned by several fundamental shifts and market dynamics. Cointelegraph, a reputable source in the crypto space, highlighted that analysts are pointing to specific on-chain metrics and comparative performance against Bitcoin as key drivers for the continued positive outlook on the Ethereum price . One of the most compelling indicators is the ETH/BTC exchange inflows ratio. This metric essentially compares the amount of Ethereum being sent to exchanges versus Bitcoin. A lower ratio for ETH suggests that fewer Ethereum holders are looking to sell their assets compared to Bitcoin holders. This reduced selling pressure is a critical factor, as it indicates stronger conviction among ETH holders and less immediate supply hitting the market, which can naturally support an upward movement in the Ethereum price . Think of it this way: if fewer people are putting their ETH up for sale, while demand remains constant or increases, the price has more room to grow. This relative strength against Bitcoin is particularly noteworthy because Bitcoin often dictates the overall market sentiment. When an altcoin like Ethereum shows independent strength and lower selling pressure relative to BTC, it signals a maturing market where assets are valued on their own merits, not just as a derivative of Bitcoin‚Äôs movements. Key Indicators Pointing to Further Ethereum Price Growth Beyond the exchange inflows, another powerful piece of evidence supporting a potential surge in the Ethereum price comes from the ETH/BTC ETF Holding Ratio. This ratio, which tracks the proportion of Ethereum holdings versus Bitcoin holdings in various exchange-traded products (ETPs) or similar investment vehicles, has seen a remarkable increase. Starting from a modest 0.02 in May, it has now climbed to an impressive 0.12. What does this significant jump signify? It indicates a growing institutional and sophisticated investor appetite for Ethereum relative to Bitcoin. As more traditional financial products and large-scale investors allocate a larger percentage of their crypto portfolios to ETH, it injects substantial capital into the Ethereum ecosystem. This increased demand from institutional players can create a strong floor for the Ethereum price and fuel its upward momentum. It reflects a long-term confidence in Ethereum‚Äôs technology, its vast ecosystem, and its potential as a foundational layer for the decentralized internet. Let‚Äôs visualize the impact of these two key indicators: Indicator Current Trend Implication for Ethereum Price ETH/BTC Exchange Inflows Ratio Lower for ETH vs. BTC Reduced selling pressure, strong holder conviction. ETH/BTC ETF Holding Ratio Increased from 0.02 to 0.12 Growing institutional demand, increased capital inflow. What Challenges Could Impact Ethereum Price Momentum? While the outlook for the Ethereum price appears overwhelmingly positive, it‚Äôs crucial to acknowledge potential headwinds. No market moves in a straight line, and crypto is particularly known for its volatility. Here are a few factors that could introduce challenges: Broader Market Corrections: A significant downturn in the overall cryptocurrency market, perhaps triggered by macroeconomic factors or regulatory news, could pull down the Ethereum price regardless of its individual strength. Regulatory Uncertainty: The evolving regulatory landscape for cryptocurrencies globally remains a key concern. Unfavorable rulings or new restrictions could impact investor sentiment and liquidity. Network Congestion & Fees: Although Ethereum is constantly evolving (e.g., with scaling solutions like Layer 2s), periods of high network activity can still lead to increased transaction fees and slower processing times, potentially deterring some users. Competition: While Ethereum remains dominant, new Layer 1 blockchains are continually emerging, offering competitive features. Sustained innovation is key for Ethereum to maintain its lead. Navigating the Path to $4,500: Actionable Insights for Ethereum Price Enthusiasts The first major resistance level for the Ethereum price is identified at $4,500. Breaking past this psychological and technical barrier would be a significant milestone, potentially opening the doors to new all
